channel.title: Pvp
channel.description:
Why is it disabled?
I appreciate the fact the plugin isn't working, but why not have it on all the time like it has been forever.

[/quote]
so off during minecraft day, and on during minecraft night?[/quote]

Correct.

item.title: Pvp
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:55, topic:424036”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=526686.msg3838685#msg3838685 date=1323061198]
Yes but unlike you guys, like Triston pointed out, we don’t WANT to always have to worry about PvP and getting our stuff stolen.
[/quote]

my point exactly, i just wanna stroll around and build stuff. plus if i make iron armour, someone with diamond sword kill my before i can defend. and if i die, i lose my minecart, my sword, and other building stuff i had when i was trying to get somewhere… but im content with the pvp at night. now is this at night as in minecraft time or real world time?[/quote]

Right now it is just off until I can get the plugin working, but it will be on during minecraft night and on during minecraft day.

Read full topic

my point exactly, i just wanna stroll around and build stuff. plus if i make iron armour, someone with diamond sword kill my before i can defend. and if i die, i lose my minecart, my sword, and other building stuff i had when i was trying to get somewhere… but im content with the pvp at night. now is this at night as in minecraft time or real world time?

item.title: Pvp
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Tbh, I think the player activity probably has to do with all the holidays around this time of the year, people in school and college have finals and other exams, as well as making sure they pass all their classes. There are all the new games that have come out recently for xbox and ps3. I still think it’s pretty decent though. The other day I remember there was a constant 8 for a good 5 hours at least.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Because we don’t like residence either…

And yea, we don’t play. Because of PvP… The world is already ruined, when I voted for it I specifically said I wanted it to be a work together world (hence the border…), and so did the majority of people, but you guys already turned it into a battlefield that nobody except you guys want to be a part of. Well done.

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

What’s wrong with world 1 for people who want to build and not have to worry about PVP? You guys had PVP nerfed with the stupid residence mod on W1, and now you’ve ruined that you want to nerf it on W2.

Also, I like how all the anti-PVP people are the people who never play.

Read full topic
